climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX MADE IN GREEN products are tested for harmful substances and made in safer workplaces with reduced environmental impacts. OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗠𝗲𝗺𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗙𝗼𝗮𝗺 𝗣𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄𝘀】 - Are you suffering from neck pain all night? Our side sleeper pillow does help to reduce neck and shoulder pain, as well as snoring. Very suitable for all posture sleepers(side, back and stomach). The innovative cervical design and memory foam cradles the natural curvature of your neck to improves sleeping quality. Try them out and experience the ultimate in comfort and support.

【𝟮 𝗛𝗲𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗡𝗲𝗰𝗸 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁】 - Do you often toss and turn because you can't find the height that suits you? Featured with the size of 24.8×14.5×5.1 inches, our ergonomic pillow is perfect for all positions of sleepers. The Olumoon neck pillow is designed to provide optimal support to your head, neck, and shoulders, reducing tension and helping to alleviate neck pain. Designed with different heights on both sides for you to choose, so you can choose the one which is more suitable for you.

【𝗕𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝗸𝗶𝗻-𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗹𝘆 𝗣𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄𝗰𝗮𝘀𝗲】 - Our neck pillows for sleeping with removable and washable pillowcase adopts unique butterfly design. There are specific grooves that allows your arms to go under for comfortable sleep. Its soft & breathable fabric keeps you cool all night, give you the comfortable sleep you want!

【𝗦𝗹𝗼𝘄 𝗥𝗲𝗯𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗹】 - The premium quality memory foam is firm and not too soft for maximum comfort and great relaxation of your head, neck, shoulders and back. The cervical neck pillow will rebound within 3-5 seconds when no press, non-deformation all the year. It does NOT compress auricle like other common pillows. Please NOTE that the memory foam pillow core CANNOT be washed!

【𝗛𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗹𝗲-𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗣𝘂𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗮𝘀𝗲】 - Olumoon pillow for neck and shoulder pain provides good solution for the elderly, students, IT workers and those with sleep disorders. Memory foam will have a very slight smell after passing through a high temperature and airtight transportation environment. This is a normal phenomenon. After receiving it, please place it in a cool and ventilated place for 3-5 days. If for any reason you're not satisfied with the orthopedic pillow, please feel free to contact us.

Is this OLUMOON memory foam pillows can be used for cervical spondylosis? The contour pillow can only be helpful for improving sleeping quality, relieve your pain. Is there any weird smell of the pillow when first use? The memory foam have a very slight smell, which is normal. Our cervical pillows are certified by CertiPUR-US, so we can ensure the safety of raw materials. Please leave it in well-ventilated area for 3-5 days before using. Will the contour pillow flatten after using for a while? Olumoon contour pillow is made of high memory foam. It will rebound within 5 seconds when no pressure. The pillow can hold its shape very well. What should I do if I feel uncomfortable at the first time? Actually it's normal. You may experience some discomfort during the first two weeks while your body is trying to adjust to the correct position. Keep using it and you will see the effect Which side is recommended for back sleepers? Both sides of the memory foam pillows are ergonomically designed to support you head, neck, and shoulders. You can choose to use the most comfortable side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and supportive
reviews.reviewText: I wish I would have found this pillow a long time ago! The support for my neck is amazing. I sleep better and I wake up pain free. This pillow is an absolute must purchase if you have neck pain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neck Pillow: Very Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Neck Pillow, and I must say, it has been an absolute game-changer in the comfort department. From the moment I rested my head on it, I felt a luxurious sense of support and relaxation.Not only does this neck pillow provide an unparalleled level of comfort, but it has also done wonders for my posture. I've struggled with maintaining a straight back and neck alignment, especially during long hours at work or while traveling. However, since incorporating this neck pillow into my routine, I've experienced a remarkable improvement.The ergonomic design cradles my neck in just the right way, offering the perfect balance between softness and firm support. It feels like a personalized oasis of comfort, easing tension and promoting a sense of well-being. I've noticed a significant reduction in stiffness, and the added bonus is the positive impact on my posture.Day after day, I've found myself sitting up straighter and more consciously, thanks to the gentle encouragement from this remarkable neck pillow. It has become an essential companion, whether I'm working at my desk, reading a book, or catching some much-needed rest during travel.The Neck Pillow has truly elevated my comfort game, and its influence on my posture has been nothing short of transformative. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking a premium, comfortable, and posture-improving solution for their neck and back. It's not just a pillow; it's a daily indulgence in well-being and relaxation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Supportive
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this pillow for about 20 days now and have used it almost every night. I was nervous and a little skeptical, but I actually really enjoy this pillow! I had a stiffness in my neck from using a regular pillow that is almost gone using this one that better supports my neck. I find that I am able to sleep on my side comfortably as well as my back. I truthfully thought I would end up giving this pillow back, but I will be keeping it around for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pillow is wonderful 🙌🏻
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is amazing! Whether you’re a back sleeper, side sleeper or stomach sleeper, it offers amazing neck support and comfort! I just had a baby 3 months ago and was struggling every morning with a stiff neck and sore muscles because of poor pillow quality and was desperately needing relief and if you’re a mom, you know we need all the rest we can possibly get!! This pillow is a game changer! It’s like sleeping on a soft cloud and it also has a cool temperature feeling to it that helps me stay cool while sleeping, too! Couldn’t recommend a better pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sleep ever
reviews.reviewText: Neck pain is gone!! Feels completely supported at night when sleeping. Every position is comfortable. Great quality. Great pillowcase. Completely satisfied! 😀

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not good for sleeping on
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like these pillows. They are very soft, nice size, and kept their shape. Pretty comfortable to prop up on, and even lay on. Terrible for me to try to sleep on. My neck and back couldn't stand it. I tried for a whole month. The middle was too low and the sides were too awkward to lay on for an extended period because either the back of my head or face would sink into the lower middle part...depending on which side/hump I laid on. I tried putting it on top of a regular pillow, and underneath a regular pillow, but it was too high then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable for side sleeper
reviews.reviewText: As a side sleeper, I often get neck pain and have trouble sleeping comfortably. I found this pillow to be very supportive and helped me sleep better from the first night. It also has reduced my shoulder pain and neck ache. Overall, a great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great neck support
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been trying a few different neck pillows for sleep, this one is the best one so far. I’ve been able to sleep through the night without as much tossing and turning, and I wake up with no stiffness in my neck or discomfort throughout the day. A standard size pillowcSe fits over the pillow. Furthermore, I’ve been going to the chiropractor almost every week to adjust my neck, now I don’t feel like I need to go again!
